survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Workplace Air Quality Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employee satisfaction and concerns regarding indoor air quality in the workplace, including perceptions of health impacts and preferences for improvements.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current air quality in your workplace?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for better measurement of satisfaction levels. Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current air quality in your workplace?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: Which of the following air quality issues have you noticed in your workplace? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture common issues. Include an 'Other' option if needed for additional feedback.

script.question_text: Which of the following air quality issues have you noticed in your workplace? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: Have you experienced any health symptoms that you believe are related to workplace air quality?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Keep options simple to gather initial data. Follow-up questions can be added based on responses.

script.question_text: Have you experienced any health symptoms that you believe are related to workplace air quality?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: If you answered 'Yes' to the previous question, please describe the symptoms you have experienced.
questions.routing_logic: This question appears only if Q3 is answered with 'Yes'.
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to allow detailed responses. Ensure the field is mobile-friendly for ease of input.

script.question_text: If you answered 'Yes' to the previous question, please describe the symptoms you have experienced.
script.routing_logic: This question appears only if Q3 is answered with 'Yes'.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see regarding air quality in your workplace?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Encourage detailed feedback to identify actionable improvements. Consider limiting response length to 500 characters.
